summary: A documentary about various singers, musicians, artists, astrologers, etc., who attended a "New Age" gathering in Maui, Hawaii.
cast: Jimi Hendrix|Bob Amacker|Baron Bingen|Charlotte Blob|Jimmy Cameron|Yella Cameron|Billy Cox|Barry De Prendergast|Herbie Fletcher|Paul Gebauer|Benny Harrison|Pat Hartley|Patricia Higgens|Luke Hyneg|Michael Hynson|Barry Kanaiaupuni|Miss Mercy|Melinda Merryweather|Mitch Mitchell|David Nuuhiwa|Teresea Pinter|Allan Schubin|Clara Shuff|Adam Strange|Steve Sutherland|Maureen Thornton|Chuck Wein
title: Rainbow Bridge
